game.name: Disney Princess Dress Store
game.description:
Elsa has recently opened a fashion store where a wider range of trendy and fashionable outfits and other accessories are sold. Now her best friends and cute princesses Anna, Ariel, Sofia and Moana have heard about it and they have made a plan to purchase new dresses from there. Elsa is new to this profession, so she needs your help to fulfill the dress needs of her every customer. Would you help her out? Join Disney Princess Dress Store and be prepared to help princesses to choose the correct outfits!
New guests keep visiting at her store time to time. Guide Elsa to attend all the customers and allow her to play the role of a professional sales person in this brand new dressing game for girls! Every girl will come with a basket every time. The princess gives you an idea about what is in her mind and you as a sales woman have to help her to collect all the items she needs now. Your customer shows her happy expression with lots of hearts flowing upward. 
Apart from the dresses, you also have to help your customers to pick up a pair of matching shoes. Make sure to dress up them all one by one. Please do not forget to collect some needful accessories like a pair of matching earrings, necklace and bracelet. It will be your job now to help all the princesses to enjoy a hassle-free shopping experience in this one of the best html5 princess shopping games. Check out more free girls games that are playable online, no download required on atmegame.com!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Disney Princess Dress Store at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Dressing games for best excitement and thrill in you!
